en: The quid landed on the child’s foot.

ngiemboon: A ně ḿmaʼ mbaŋa tʉ̌, é  kime na kwò yɔ́ɔn.
en: He threw the nail, it stuck on my foot.
monochord arched harp, with a single string attached from a bowed stick inserted in a tin-can resonator, played by children

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ kɔʼɔ́ nzɔ̌? Mèŋ ńkɔʼɔ́ mbʉ̀a.
en: Where were you? I was at home.
I have to go to the market.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n kɔ́gɔ lépfɛ́ɛ mmó ɔ́.
en: I am small to eat your food.
